#Introduction

#Important Terms and Concepts

An __information system__ is a set of hardware, software, data, people and procedures that work together to produce information (Vermaat et al., 2016, p. 554). 

Properties of Information

#Examples of Information Systems

__Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)__ integrates manufacturing resource planning with the information flow across an organization to manage and coordinate the ongoing activities of the enterprise, including product planning, manufacturing and distribution, accounting and finance, sales, human resources, and customer support (Vermaat et al., 2016, p. 555).
